pages.title: ORSA Heavy Thermal Suit
pages.text: $(bold)ORSA Mk.II Heated Survival Suit$()$(br2)When wool isn't cutting it anymore, upgrade to the Mk.II! Infused with blaze powder heating elements, this suit provides $(bold)cold resistance up to Phase 4$() (-45°C).$(br2)$(italic)WARNING: Blaze powder is flammable. Do not hug creepers. ORSA accepts no liability for spontaneous combustion.$()

pages.title: Specifications
pages.text: $(bold)Protection:$() Each piece adds +11.25°C cold resistance. Full set provides $(bold)+45°C total$().$(br2)$(bold)Rated for:$() Phase 1-4 surface conditions$(br)$(bold)Bonus:$() Reduces Phase 5+ wind chill by 50%$(br2)$(bold)Requires:$() Tier 1 insulated clothing (yes, you wear it OVER the first suit — fashion is dead, warmth is not)$(br2)$(italic)Warranty void if suit is used as a sleeping bag, oven mitt, or romantic gift.$()
Surround your Tier 1 gear with blaze powder. What could go wrong?
Your head is now a portable furnace. You're welcome.
